title: Ambient Futuristic Music
description: 10 ambient tracks in two versions - with tail and loopable, ranging from lush pads to atmospheric electronic.
longDescription:
ASTRA | Ambient Futuristic Music

by Wiktoria Zac


LISTEN NOW


This music pack contains 10 music tracks in two variations (full with tail and seamless loops, which gives 20 tracks total).

Designed for Sci-Fi, Futuristic Worlds, RPGs, and everything in between! Perfect for promotional purposes. The tracks have been created using the best quality tools and techniques.


The pack includes:

➼ 10 Professionally mastered original tracks in two variations

➼ Minutes of audio provided: full 39 min 52 sec | seamless loops 38 min 53 sec

➼ 24/44.1 kHz .wav format


TRACKLIST (44.1kHz, 24bit, Stereo)

▶ Polaris | full mix - 4:12 | loop - 4:03

▶ Castor | full mix - 4:24 | loop - 4:17

▶ Pollux | full mix - 4:18 | loop - 4:12

▶ Arcturus | full mix - 3:41 | loop - 3:33

▶ Sirius | full mix - 4:00 | loop - 3:53

▶ Altair | full mix - 3:45 | loop - 3:41

▶ Sun | full mix - 3:39 | loop - 3:35

▶ Antares | full mix - 3:54 | loop - 3:49

▶ Canopus | full mix - 3:59 | loop - 3:55

▶ Vega | full mix - 4:00 | loop - 3:55


If you're looking for original music for your project, feel free to reach out to me at wiktoriazac@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 20

Sample rate/bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 1411kbps, 24 bits, Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes
